name: Amanda Gray
text: Definitely one of my favorite pizza place. Great spot for family bonding too!

name: Donald Swope
text: We arrived at this restaurant for a meeting. my friend recommended this restaurant.  Well, we were not disappointed. The staff were extremely nice and we had a great feeling. The food was just great. We enjoyed every moment and we will definitely return to this restaurant. we highly recommend this place.

name: PutActu
text: The worst pizza ever. Don't waste your money please and get anything but not that. I've eaten a lot of pizza in my life and this one was the the worst, most blend, most undercooked etc I feel violated.

name: Cam Ashby
text: I ate your pizza and it was like I’m back in italy

name: Mia Tabares
text: I am livid ! I ordered through the blaze pizza application for iPhone . I ordered the two for ten  dollar pizza .. than it said I had to order a minimum purchase of 15 so I order a side salad and brownie ! The pizza arrived cold and hard …More

name: harjeet singh
text: Place was packed and the person handling the final touching on the pizza was overwhelmed. The entire process was too rushed and I had to tell them several times to correctly add certain toppings. The pizza was delicious but the whole process was hectic.

name: Victoria B.
text: Only open when Staples Centers is open. Hours are wrong as posted.

name: Kelii Jimenez
text: Only open during game nights, lame.

name: hyosuki
text: (Translated by Google) I called it diy pizza, but I just ordered a signature pizza and ate it. I can see the process of making it as an open kitchen, but there are some parts that are a little worried about hygiene. It bakes very quickly, …More
(Translated by Google) Good pizzeria. It is a pity that it works only during the games. …More
